original_text:
Then the nations came against him,
    those from regions round about.
They spread their net for him,
    and he was trapped in their pit.
korean_text: 이방이 포위하고 있는 지방에서 그를 치러 와서 그의 위에 그물을 치고 함정에 잡아

sentences.original_text: Then the nations came against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 여러 민족들이 그를 대항하여 나아왔고

sentences.original_text: They spread their net for him
and he was trapped in their pit
